snippet.title: Elemental Kingdoms - Trailer HD (Download game for Android & Iphone/ipad)
snippet.description:
Download Elemental Kingdoms
Download for Iphone/Ipad: http://bit.ly/MuAwYI
Download for Android: http://bit.ly/1axpkWu

Review: 
Elemental Kingdoms is a free-to-play collectible card game (CCG) and strategic battle game. With over 200 cards and runes to choose from, assemble your deck and put it to the ultimate test. Play against your friends (PvP) and challenge random players to hold the prestige of having the most powerful deck ever created.

NeoClips is a mobile application that lets you exclusively enjoy the top game videos. Discover the top games that everyone's talking about!
